#summary tomcat6 servlet container

= Apache Tomcat 6 Servlet Container =


= Install =

== Ubuntu ==
 * 1. get tomcat6, tomcat6-common, tomcat6-admin, tomcat-user
 * 2. add tomcat manager user. For more information [http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/manager-howto.html Manager App HOW-TO]

add manager role, and user in /etc/tomcat6/tomcat-users.xml
{{{
 <role rolename="manager"/>
 <user username="tomcat" password="s3cret" roles="manager"/>
}}}
